publicationStmt.p: This is a transcription of a Khom script manuscript (PA_Camb_37_VI) from Det Kongelige Bibliotek, Denmark.

body.p:
| nam’ atthu | natvā lokaviduṃ buddhaṃ dhammaṃ saṃghañ ca sādhukaṃ okāsalokaṃ dipassa yathāyuttaṃ suṇātha me | tatth’ ekacakkavāḷamhi āyāmā pi ca vitthārā dvādasasatasahassayojanāni tathā
paraṃ sesaṃ tisahassacatusataṃ paññāsa⁅ñ ca⁆samiritaṃ ○ | sabbaṃ satasahassāni chatiṃsaparimaṇḍalaṃ dasañ c’eva saha○ssāni aḍhuḍhāni satāni ca | duve satasaha
ssāni cattari nahutāni ca ettakaṃ bahalaṅgena ○ saṃkhyātāyaṃ basundharā | cattāri satasahassā aṭṭh’eva nahutāni ○ ca ettakaṃ bahalaṅgena jalaṃ vāte patitthitaṃ |
navasatasahassāni (mā)luto nabhamuggato sa○ṭṭhiñ c’eva sahassāni esā lokassa saṇṭhāti | cakkavāḷassa ○ vemajjhe silābhūpyaṃ patitthito tikuṭeh’ ādhi
karaṇamūlasaṇṭhānakehi tu | caturāsītisahassāni ajjhogāḷhe mahaṇṇave accuggato ca vitthinno tāvad eva na ttutta(mo) | duve satasahassāni pañc’ eva nahutāni ca sahassā

ni duve hoti parikkhepo sineruno | aṭṭhasaṭṭhīsahassāni lakkham ekañ ca sabba(n)ā pādato yāva c’ aggā selarā(j)ā samuṭṭhito | pācinapassaṃ rajaṭaṃ dakkhiṇaṃ indanilakaṃ pacchimaṃ pha
likaṃ passaṃ utaraṃ kāñcanamayaṃ | pubbadakkhiṇapa○ssena maṇirajaṭaraṃsiyo maṇiphalikaraṃsī ca passā dakkhiṇapa○cchimā pacchimuttarato passā suvaṇṇaphalikappa⁅..⁆bhā
pācinnattarapassamhā suvaṇṇarajaṭappakā | nikkhantā ○ meruto etā gantvā sā(g)arapiṭṭhito cakkavāḷaṇ ṭhitaṃ ha ca | cattā○ro tāhi sā(g)arā | cattāri patibhaṇḍāni sinerussa pa
māṇato pañcapañcasahassāni yojanāni bha○vanti hi tāva t(ī)sābhirakkhehi nātādīh’ ev’ adhiṭṭhitā | tato upaḍḍha○paḍhena pamāṇena yathākkamaṃ ajjhogāḷha
gatā dibbā nānāratanavicittakā | yuggandharo isindaro karaviko sudassano nemindaro vinattako assakaṇṇo giribrahā | ete sattamahāselā sinerussa samantato

mahārājānam āvāsā devayakkhā nisevitā | yuggandharo dvitāḷīsaṃ ekavīsaṃ isindharo karaviko sahassāni dasapañcasatāni ca | sudassano sahassāni pañcapaññāsadvesatā
nemindaro dvisahassaṃ chasataṃ pañcavīsati | vi○nattako dvādasañ ca sahassā tisataṃ bhave assakaṇṇo chapaññā○sa chasatān’ ekagāvutaṃ | ete sattamahā
selā ubbedhato bahalato ettakā etta○kāy’ eva ubbedhā dviguṇā (t)ato catu(r)āsītidvi(t)āḷīsaṃ e○kavīsaṃ yathākkamaṃ dasañ c’eva sahassāni tathā
pañcasatāni {c}ca pañcam’ eva sahassāni paññāsu○ttaradvesatā duve sahassā chasatā pañcavīsatiyādhikā sa○hassaṃ tisatañ c’eva yojanānañ ca dvā«da»sa | satta
sidaṇṇavā ce te (g)ambhi⁅..⁆rattena vitthārā tappamānā ca daṭṭhañ ca anupubbasamuggatā tasmāssakaṇṇapādamhi gambhirattena taṃ samā tato ’nupubbanicchāte tena tena sama(g)atā | te asītisahassāni tisatā

ni titāḷīsaṃ gāvu{t}tāni patiṇ’ eva tadambo sattapabbato | lakkham ekaṃ sahassāni chasaṭṭhī chasatāni ca sattasītidvigāvutaṃ piṇḍo yaṃ sattasāgare | pañcalakkhāsahassāni caturāsītidvisaṭṭhī ca yojana
ḍhañ ca vitthārā aṅgara(ta)mahānatā | sattarasacalakkhā○ni dvepaññāsasahassādikā sataasītisattāḍhaṃ maṇḍalaṃ assa○kaṇṇakā | cakkavāḷasaddhiṃ merunaṃ aṅgaraṃ yojanāni tu
cattāri satasahassāni sahassā satasattati(ṃ) sattā○ni sattañeyyāni pañcavīsuttarāni ca | cakkavāḷassa kaṇṇānaṃ aṅga○raṃ jalasāgaro duvelakkhasahassāni satavīsati cha
satā navutitīṇiñeyyāni yojanāni tigā○vutaṃ | assakaṇṇasamipam hi gambhirattena gaṅgato tato ’nupubba○ninno so cakkavāḷam bhirato | satasahassāne
katisaṃ sahassāni dasaṭṭha ca tisatañ c’eva paññāsa samuddaparimaṇḍalaṃ | dveasītisahassāni ajjhogāḷho mahaṇṇave accuggato ca vitthino cakkavāḷasiluccayo | satasa

hassam ubbedho sahassa ca tuṭṭhīyā parikkhipitvā taṃ sabbaṃ lokadhātumayaṇ ṭhito | dasayojanasahassāni jambudipo pamāṇato hoti sakaṭasaṇṭhāno tikātaṃ samupāgato
| manussā ekakā tamhi tisahass’ eva santite sā○garo catusahassaṃ himavā tisahassiyo | caturasso ’ttarakuru○dipo aṭṭhasahassiyo | dipo pubbavideho ca
aḍhacandasamupamo | vaṭṭo amaragoyāno dve ○ ’me sattasahassiyo bhaddantadhammapāsena yathā bh(ū)tatthadassanā ○ pubbapacchimadipānaṃ evaṃ saṇṭhānam īritaṃ | vaṭṭo pubba
videho ti (g)oyāno aḍhacandako evaṃ bāhi○rake satthe vadant’ aññe pan’ añathā | tāvataṃsā surapuraṃ avicinirayo ○ tathā jambudipo ca etāni samān’ eva pamānato |
jambu ca jambudipamhi asurānañ ca pātali simbalīgarud(dh)ānañ ca (g)oyāne ca kadambako kurūsu kapparukkho ca videhe siriso dumo tāvatiṃse pāricchanto kappaṭṭhā sattime dumā | tipañcayo

janakhanthaṃ parikkhepā ime dumā paññāsayojanakkhanthā sākhāyāmāsamantato satayojanavitthinnā tāvad eva ca uggatā ti | iti okāsalokadipaniyaṃ bhummaṭṭhadipano nāma pathamo kaṇḍo
| atha pan’ ākāsaṭṭhaparicchedo vuccati pathamuppattikā○le kira candimasuriyanakkhattatārakarūpasinerupakkavāḷahimavantapabba○tadipasamuddā apubbaṃ aparimaṃ phagguṇapuṇṇamīdivase ye
va pātubhavanti | tadā tesaṃ sattānaṃ rasapathavaṃ paribhū○ñjantānaṃ sayampabhāya antarahitāya andhakārābhibhavena bhi(t)asitānaṃ ○ ālokaṃ patthayamānānaṃ surabhāvajanayamānaṃ su
riyamaṇḍalaṃ uṭṭhahi | ten’ ev’ assa suriyo ti nā○maṃ ahosi | tasmiṃ divasaṃ ālokaṃ katvā atthaṅgamite puna ’ndha○kāre (j)āte pun’ aññaṃ ālokaṃ patthayantā pana a
tha nesaṃ chandaṃ ñatvā viya candamaṇḍalo uṭṭhahi | ten’ ev’ assa cando ti nāmaṃ ahosi | tesu cando maṇivimāne vasati | taṃ bāhiraṃ rajaṭena parikkhitaṃ anto c’eva bahi ca ubhayaṃ pi sī

tam eva hoti | suriyo anto kanakavimāne vasati taṃ bāhiraṃ phalikaṃ parikkhitaṃ taṃ ubhayam pi uṇham eva | cando ujukaṃ āyāmato vitthārato u«b»bedhato ca ekuṇapaññāsa
yojano | parimaṇḍalato tīhi yojane○hi onadiyaḍhasatayojanā | suriyo ujukaṃ āyāmavi○thārubbedhato paññāsayojano parimaṇḍalato
diyaḍhasatayojano | cando heṭṭhā suriyo ○ uparithito aṅgarānesaṃ yojanaṃ hoti | candassa heṭṭhimanta○to suriyass’ uparimantato yojanasataṃ hoti |
cando ujukaṃ sanikaṃ gacchati | ujugamanan nāma udaya○ṭṭhānato atthaṅgaṭṭhānagamanaṃ | so hi amābasiyaṃ suriyena saddhiṃ ○ gacchanto divase divase yojanānaṃ satasahassaṃ o
hāyamāno puṇṇamāsiyaṃ upaḍhamagge y’eva ohiyati | cando tiriyaṃ si{ṃ}ghaṃ gacchati tiriyaṃ gamanaṃ nāma uttarato dakkhiṇā«bh»imukhaṃ gamanaṃ dakkhiṇato (v)ā uttarābhimukhaṃ gamanaṃ | so hi yasmiṃ mā

se sukkapakkhassa pathamapāṭipadadivase yasmiṃ thāne paññāyati tato uttarābhimukhaṃ vā dakkhiṇābhimukhaṃ vā gantvā ten’ eva ekamāsena puna taṃ thānaṃ pāpuṇi | tasmā tassa tiriyagamanaṃ si{ṃ}
ghan ti vuc(c)ati | candassa dvīsu passesu purato paccha○to samañ ca nakkhattatāratā gacchanti | cando dhen(u) viya vacchaṃ taṃ taṃ nakkha○ttaṃ upasaṅgamati | nakkhattāni pana attano vithiyā va
gacchato attano gamanaṭṭhānaṃ na vijjahanti | suri○yassa tiriyagamanaṃ dandhaṃ | so hi yasmiṃ māse yassaṃ vithiyaṃ yasmiṃ ○ vārāsimhi thito tato chahi māsehi uttaraṃ chahi mā
sehi dakkhiṇañ ca gantvā ekasaṃvaccharena puna taṃ ○ māsaṃ taṃ vithiṃ taṃ rāsiṃ pāpuṇāti | tasmiṃ suriyassa tiriyagamanaṃ dandha○n ti vuccati | ujukagamanaṃ siṃghaṃ so āmāsi
yaṃ candena samāgantvā sukkapakkhassa pathamadivase attano siṃghagāmitāya candassa dandh(u)gāmitāya yojanānaṃ satasahassaṃ candamaṇḍalaṃ ohāya gacchati | atha cando pacchimadisāya lekkhā viya

dissati | dutiyāya satasahassan ti yāva uposathadivasā satasahassaṃ ohāya gacchati | atha cando anukkamena vaḍhitvā uposathadiva⁅..⁆se sabbaso paripuṇṇo hoti puna
kālapakkhassa pathamapātipadadivase pandassa dandhagāmi○tāya attano ca siṃghagāmitāya «y»ojanānaṃ satasahassaṃ (ch)āvi○tvā gaṇhati | dutiyāya satasahassan ti yāva u
posathadivasā satasahassaṃ (ch)āvitvā gaṇhāti | a○tha (c)ando anukkamena hāyitvā uposathadivase sabbaso na paññāya○ti | cando heṭṭhā katvā suriyo upari hoti
mahatiyā pātiyā uddakabhājanaṃ viya candamaṇḍalaṃ ○ paṭicchādeti | majjhantike te⁅..⁆ha cchāyā viya tassa (ch)āyā na pa○ññāyati | so (ch)āyāya apaññāyamānāya
dure thitānaṃ divā padipo viya «saya»m pi na paññāyati | ettha candamaṇḍalassa hānaṃ vaḍhanañ ca evaṃ veditabbaṃ⁅o⁆ | cando sukkapakkhe attano uparibhāgato pati(g)asuriyā lokena heṭṭhato pavattāya

attano (ch)āyāya suriyassa duradurabhāvena divase divase anukkamena parihāyamānāya attano (ch)āyāya vasena anukkamena attano maṇḍalapadesassa vaḍhamānassa viya passantānaṃ dissamā
natāya anukkamena vaḍhanto viya puṇṇamāyaṃ puripu○ṇṇamaṇḍalo viya hutvā (di)ssati | kālapakkhe divase divase suri○yāsannabhāvena (ch)āyāya avaḍhamānatāya canda
ssa maṇḍalaṃ hāyamānaṃ viya dissatī ti | iti candī○masuriyaparivattadipano nāma dutiyo kaṇḍo | candimasiriyā○naṃ ajjavithī (n)āgavithī govithī ti tisso vithīyā honti
| yāya vithiyā suriye (ga)cchante vasssavalāha○kā devaputtā suriyābhitā pasaṅga(tt)ā attano vimānato na nikkhama○nti | kiḷā pasutā hutvā na vicaranti | tadā kira
suriyavimānaṃ pakatimattato adho otarit(v)ā vicarati | tassa oruyha caranten’ eva candavimānaṃ adho oruyha carati taggatikattā | tasmā sāvithī udakābhāvena ajjānurūpatāya ajjavithī ti samaññaṃ (g)a

tā | yāya pana vithiyā suriye gacchante vassavalāhakadevaputtā suriyābhitā pabhāvato abhiṇhaṃ attano vimānato bahinikkhamitvā kiḷāpasutā va ito pito va viparanti | tadā
kira suriyavimānaṃ pakatimaggato uddhaṃ āruyhitvā vicara○ti | tassa uddhaṃ āruyha caranten’ eva candavimānaṃ pi uddhaṃ āruyha carati ○ taṃgatikattā | taṃgatikatāya ca samānagati(n)ā vāta
maṇḍalena vimānassa pellitabbattā | tasmā sā vithī ○ udakaṃ bahubhāvena (n)āgānurūpatāya (n)āgavithī ti samaññaṃ gatā | ya○dā suriyo uddhaṃ a(n)āruyhanto adho ca ano(t)aranto
ca pakatimaggen’ eva gacchati | tadā vassavalāhakā ○ yathākālaṃ yathārūciñ (c)a vimānato nikkhamitvā sukhena caranti | te○na kālena kālaṃ vassanato loke utusamatā
hoti | tāya utusamatāya hetubhutāya sā candimasuriyānaṃ gatigatānurupatāya govithī ti samaññaṃ gatā | candimasuriyā chamāse sineruto bahinikkhamanti chamāse antovicara

nti | idaṃ pana vacanaṃ appakālaṃ candabahukālassa suriyassa antonitaṃ katvā vuttaṃ | suriyo yeva bahichamāse nikkhamati chamā⁅..⁆se pavīsati | na cando | cando pana aḍhamāse nikkhamati
aḍhamāse pavīsati | etthāyaṃ viṭṭhārakathā | si○nerussa cakkavāḷassa ca yaṃ thānaṃ vemajjhaṃ taṃ majjhimavithī nāma | ta○ssa vemajjhaṭṭhānassa sineruno ca yaṃ thānaṃ vemajjhaṃ
taṃ antovithī nāma | tassa ca vemajjhaṭṭhānassa cakka○vāḷassa ca yaṃ thānaṃ vemajjhaṃ taṃ bahivithi nāma | ettha sinerusaddena ○ yadi selarā(j)ā ca (ga)hito bhaveyya | atthayu
tti ca na siyā dassanañ ca na sameyya | kathaṃ a○tthāyuttitā dassanā samatā | sā antovithī sineruto satasa○hassaekuṇavīsatisahassāni cattārisatā
ni ekavīsatiyojanāni ekagāvutañ ca yugandarapabbatassa opari yeva hoti | tattha ṭṭhito majjhattikasuriyo jambudipakānaṃ upari hoti | (ch)āyā pi nesaṃ sariranto gacchati | tasmā jambudi

po tassā heṭṭhā yugandarapabbate yeva āpajjheyyā ti | (n)āpajjeyya uccataravasena tathā dassanato ti ce | sā vithi jambudipato dure sādhikāṭṭhanahutasahassayojanappamāṇā |
tattha ṭṭhito pi suriyo uccatarabhāvena upariṭṭhito ○ viya yadi paññāyati | majjhimavithī pana sudassanapabbatassa ○ bahi samuddamajjhe uparibh(ā)ākāse thito tato
āsannā sādhikasaṭṭhī sahassayojanappamāṇā ○ | tatra ṭṭhito majjhattikasuriyo jambudipakānaṃ upariṭṭhito viya ka○smā na paññāyati | uttaradisāya thito pi samā
no kasmā dakkhiṇadisato ca paññāyati | (ch)āyā ○ pi ca tipadani(gg)atā | bahivithī ca tato āsannatarāsādhikapaññā○sayojanappamāṇā dakkhinadisāya thitā |
tattha ṭṭhito upariṭṭhito viya na dissati | dakkhiṇadisato ca dissati | (ch)āyā pi ca padani(gg)atā dure vijjamānassa upari aṭṭhitassa suriyassa upariṭṭhitabhāvagahaṇaṃ heṭṭhā aṭṭhitassa ca jambudhipassa

heṭṭhā thitabhāvagahaṇaṃ tathā dassanañ ca samipe ṭṭhitassa tathā gahaṇaṃ tathā a(da)ssanañ ca ayam etthāyuttitā dassanā samatā ca dassanaviparitatāthā ti | tasmā sinerusaddena sine
ruṃ agahetvā tassa pākāraparikkhe ca bhūto pabbatabā○hiro assakaṇṇapabbato atthayuttisambhavato dassanasamatā○ya ca gahetabbo | sinerucakkavāḷahimavantapabba
tā (p)ātubhavantī ti etthāpi sineru(g)ahaṇena ○ yugandarādayo pi gayhanti | tadā hi na sineru eko yeva pātu○bhavati | yugandharādayo pi ⁅ne⁆ tena sah’eva eka
kkhaṇe pātubhavantī ti | evaṃ sinerusaddena assa○kaṇṇapabbatassa gahaṇato sā antovithī assakaṇṇasami○pe hoti viññāyati | tasmā tassa vithiyā
ādi sinerusamipe thito | sineruto tīṇi satasahassāni (ch)asahassāni navasatāni catupaññāsayojanāni aḍhatessatāvutānī vīsatiusabhāni ca | assakaṇṇato chapaññā

sasahassāni navasatāni tevīsatiyojanāni diyaḍhagāvutaṃ vīsatiusabhāni ca | sā antovithī cakkavāḷato yojanasatasahassaṃ sattatisahassāni sattasatāni sattatiyojanāni ekagāvutaṃ
vīsatiusabhāni ca hoti | jambudipassa upari○bhāge hoti | jambudipo ca tassā heṭṭhā thito | ta○smā āsāḷhamāse tattha thito majjhantikasuriyo jambu
dipakānaṃ upari yeva hoti | (ch)āyā pi nesaṃ na pa○ññāyati sarīranto ga(dh)eti | āsāḷhamāse ekadivase si○nerusamipe caritvā tato dakkhiṇābhimukhaṃ yā
yanto anukkamena divase chasatāni battiṃsayo○janāni diyaḍha(g)āvutaṃ catutiṃsausabhāni aṭṭhadaṇḍāni chara(t)anāni pa○ñcāṅgulappamāṇañ ca | ekekasmiṃ nakkhatta
pādesatādhikaṃ dvisahassaṃ aṭṭhayojanaṃ ekagāvutaṃ aṭṭhausabhaṃ dvidaṇḍaṃ charatanaṃ ekavidatthi aṭṭhaṅgulañ ca | ekekasmiṃ nakkhatte aṭṭhasahassaṃ catusataṃ tetiṃsayojanāni battiṃsausabhaṃ

ekādasadaṇḍaṃ charatanañ ca ekamāse aṭṭhārasasahassāni navasatāni catusattatiyojanāni diyaḍha(g)āvutaṃ tettiṃsa usabhāni chadaṇḍaṃ caturatanaṃ ekavidatthicaturaṅgulappamāṇañ ca pa
desaṃ nikkhamanto taṃ antovithi atikkamati | ○ sāyaṃ vithikakkaṭarāsī ti vuccati | evaṃ sabbavithi(ṃ) sudaṭṭhabbaṃ | ta○to ravi sāvanamāsavithisiharāsiṃ saṃkamati | sā
pana vithī sineruto tīṇi satasahassāni catuca○ttāḷ(ī)sasahassāni navasatāni tīṇi yojanāni aḍhateyya ○ gāvutaṃ chausabhāni terasadaṇḍāni dviratanaṃ aṭṭhaṅgula
ñ ca | assakaṇṇato ca tu navuttisahassāni aṭṭha○satāni dvāsattatiyojanāni diyaḍha(g)āvuttaṃ chausabhaṃ terasa○daṇḍaṃ dviratanaṃ aṭṭhaṅgulañ ca | cakkavāḷato satasa
hassaṃ dvattiṃsasahassāni aṭṭhasatāni ekavīsatiyojanāni ekagāvutaṃ tetiṃsausabhaṃ chadaṇḍaṃ catuhatthaṃ ekavidatthi caturaṅgulappamāṇañ ca hoti | tato bhaddamāsavithiṃ saṃkamati |

| sā ca sineruto tisatasahassaṃ te saṭṭhīsahassaṃ aṭṭhasataṃ aṭṭhasattatiyojanāni aḍhagāvutañ ca | assakaṇṇato satasahassaṃ terasasahassaṃ aṭṭhasataṃ chapattāḷīsayojanāni a
ḍhuḍha(g)āvutañ ca | cakkavāḷato pi ekam pamāṇam ○ eva | ayaṃ vithī kaññarāsī ti vuccati | tato āssujamāsavithiṃ ○ tulyarāsiṃ saṃkamati | sā sineruto tīṇi satasa
hassāni aṭṭhasatāni dvepaññāsayojanāni ○ dvigāvutaṃ (t)etiṃsau(g)abhaṃ chadaṇḍaṃ caturatanaṃ ekavidatthicaturaṅgulañ ca ○ | assakaṇṇato satasahassaṃ ba(tt)iṃsasahassā
ni aṭṭhasataṃ ekavīsañ ca yojanāni eka(g)ā○vutañ ca usabhādīni (t)aṃsadisāni | cakkavāḷato catunavuttisaha○ssāni aṭṭhasatāni dvāsa(tt)atiyojanāni eka(g)ā
vutaṃ chausabhaṃ terasadaṇḍaṃ dvihatthaṃ aṭṭhaṅgulañ ca | kaññarāsi{lya}tularāsissa ca antare sakantitthānaṃ mahāsamuddavemajjha«ssa» uparibhāge channaṃ rāsīnaṃ majjhe hotī ti | tato kamāsavithivicchikarāsiṃ

saṅgamati | sāyaṃ kattikamāsavithīsineruto cattārisatasahassāni sahassam ekaṃ aṭṭhasataṃ sattavīsatiyojanāni chabbīsati usabhāni terasadaṇḍaṃ dvihatthaṃ aṭṭhaṅgulañ ca | assakaṇṇato
satasahassāni ekapaññāsasahassāni sattasa○tāni pañcanavuttiyojanāni ti(g)āvutaṃ usabhadīni taṃ sadisāni | ○ cakkavāḷato pañcasattatisahassāni aṭṭhasatāni sa
ttanavuttiyojanāni chādhikatigāvutaṃ terasausabhāni ○ chadaṇḍaṃ caturatanaṃ ekavidatthicatthuraṅgulañ ca | tato nikkhamanto mi○(gg)asiramāsavithī(dh)anurāsiṃ saṅkamanto yathāvutta
yojanāppamāṇena tattha yāyanto ekamā○sena dhanūrāsiṃ an(t)aṃ sabbabāliraṃ cakkavāḷasamipaṃ caranto puna ta○to nivattanto sineruṃ paṭicca uttarābhimukhaṃ yāyamāno
pussamāsavithimaṃ kārarāsiṃ saṅkamati | tato māghamāsavithiṃ kumbharāsiṃ tato phagguṇavithīminarāsiṃ tato cittamāsavithi mesarāsiṃ tato visākhamāsavithi usabharāsiṃ saṅkamati |

tato jeṭṭhamāsavithiṃ mithunarāsiṃ saṅkamanto tattha yathāvuttayojanappamāṇena dinedine pavīsanto mithunarāsī antaṃ sinerusamipaṃ gacchati | ettha dhanūrāsiṃ antaṃ maṃkararāsiṃ ādi ca ekadvayaṃ samaṃ cakkavāḷa
samipe thitaṃ | cakkavāḷato chapaññāsasahassaṃ ○ navasataṃ tevīsayojanaṃ diyaḍhagāvutaṃ vīsatiusabhañ ca | a○ssakaṇṇat⁅t⁆o satasahassasattanahuttaṃ sattasataṃ satta
tiyojanaṃ gāvutekaṃ vīsusa«t»aṃ | sineruto ca ○ tu satasahassaṃ dvinahutaṃ aṭṭhasataṃ diyaḍhayojanaṃ vīsatiusabhañ ca | ○ (dh)anurāsīādim aṅgararāsiṃ antañ ca samaṃ tathāvicch(i)
karāsiṃ antaṃ kumbharāsiādi ca vicchikarāsīādi ku○mbharāsīantañ ca tularāsiantaṃ minarāsiādi ca tularāsī○ādi minarāsīantañ ca kaññarāsīanta mesarā
sīādi ca kaññarāsīādi mesarāsīantañ ca siharāsīantaṃ usabharāsīādi ca sīharāsīādi usabharāsīantañ ca kakkaṭarāsīantaṃ mithunarāsīādi ca kakkaṭarā

sīādi mithunarāsīantañ ca saman ti veditabbaṃ | idañ ca pana dakkhiṇāyanakale uttarāyanakāle ca thitamajjhan(t)ike thāne daṭṭhabbaṃ | idaṃ pan’ ettha niyamavacanaṃ | vasse ukkaḍhi
tena adhimāse⁅na⁆ kate pathamasaṃvacchare āsā○ḷhamāsādayo kakkaṭarāsī«ā»d«ī»su yathākkamaṃ tiṭṭhanti | ta○dā jeṭṭhamāso āsāḷhamāso ca dvemāsā si
nerusamipe tiṭṭhanti | na āsāḷhamāso e○kā va tiṭṭhati | migasiramāso pussamāso ca d(v)emāsā cakkavā○ḷasamipe tiṭṭhanti | na pussamāso eko va tiṭṭhati
| dutiye pana saṃvacchare āsāḷhamāsassa sukka○pakkhamithunarāsimhi kaṇṇapakkhaṃ kakkaṭarāsimh(ī) ti eko āsāḷhamā○so va sinerusamipe thito hoti | evaṃ thitaṃ pana
gahetvā aṭṭhakathācariyehi āsāḷhamāse sinerusamipe caranti vuttaṃ evaṃ thite yeva āsāḷhamāse chāyā abhā(v)ā«dhivā»atidīgho chattiṃsanādiko rattiṃ attirassā catuvīsatinādikā |

sāvanamāsassa sukkapakkhaṃ kakkaṭarāsimhi kaṇhapakkhaṃ sīharāsimhī ti taṃ evaṃ thitaṃ gahetvā sāvanamāse nikkhamaniyamāso ti ca vuttaṃ | tadā chāyā ekapadikādi vā catutaṃsanādikā ratti(ch)abbī
satinādikā | añña(m)āsā aññarāsī ca evam eva da○ṭṭhabbā | bhaddamāse chāyādvipadikādivā dvattiṃsanādiko ratti aṭṭha○vīsati nādikā | āssujjamāse saṅkantidivase rattindi
vāsamāsanādikā | chāyā ti padikā | tato paraṃ visamā oṇādikā | kattikamāse rattibattiṃsanādikā divāaṭṭhavī○satinādiko chāyā catupadikā |
māgasiramāse ratticatutiṃsanādikādivā chabbīsanādi○ko chāyā pañcapadikā | pussamāsassa cana sukkapakkhaṃ dhanurā○simhi kaṇṇapakkhaṃ maṅkararāsimhī ti evaṃ thitaṃ pussamā
saṃ sandhāya pussamāse cakkavāḷasamipe carantī ti | tadā chāyā (cha)padikā rattiatidīghā chattiṃsanādikādivā atirasso catuvīsatinādiko | aññathā nāyādikā tathā na honti |

māghamāse chāyā pañcapadikā ratticatutiṃsanādikādivā chabbīsanādikā | phagguṇamāse chāyācatupadikā rattibattiṃsanādikādivā aṭṭhavīsatinādiko cittamāse saṅkanti divase randivāsamā
tisattisanādiko | tato paraṃ visamā onādikā ○ chāyā tipadikā | visākhamāse rattiaṭṭhavīsanādikā divābattī○sanādiko (ch)āyā dvipadikā | jeṭṭhamāse ratti
chabbīsanādikādi vā catuttiṃsanādiko chāyā e○kam adikā ti evaṃ dutiye saṃvacchare tathā tathā thite āsāḷha○māsādike ayaṃ ⁅sā⁆ chāyādini yamo labha(t)i na labha
ti aññasaṃvacchare aññathā thite ti veditabbaṃ | ○ tatiye pana saṃvacchare āsāḷhādimāsāsakavīthikakkaṭarāsīādi○to ohiyitvā | jeṭṭhamāsādi vithimithu
narāsīādīsu honti | tadā āsāḷhasāvanamāsā dve sine{r}rūsamipe honti | pussamāsamāghamāsā cakkavāḷasamipe ti | tasmā tesaṃ sakasakarāsimhi thapanatthaṃ vassaṃ ukku

ḍhantī ti | bahivithim aṅkararāsī āyāmato ca vitthārato ca navasatatahassāni pañcavīsahassāni chasatāni tīṇi yojanāni aḍha(g)āvu(t)añ ca | parimaṇḍalato sattavīsasatasahassā
ni chasattatisahassāni aṭṭhasatāni navayojanāni di○yaḍhagāvutañ ca ekam eko rāsi ujukaṃ dvesatasahassāni eka○tiṃsasahassāni cattārisatāni tigāvutaṃ dasabhañ ca
ekamekaṃ nakkhattaṃ satasahassaṃ aṭṭhasataṃ catucattāḷīsa○yojanaṃ tigāvutaṃ terasausabhaṃ chadaṇḍacaturatanaṃ eka○vidatthicaturaṅgulañ ca | ekamekaṃ nakkhattapādaṃ
pañcavīsasahassāni sattasatāni ekādasayoja○naṃ aḍhagāvutaṃ tevisaṃ usabhadaṇḍādīni vuttasadisāni a(jj)a ○ udayaṭṭhānaṃ pi na divase asambhavananto satasa
hassaṃ sattasataṃ terasayojanaṃ ekabhāvutaṃ pañcatiṃsausabhaṃ padesaṃ ohiyanto divase divase ettakaṃ ohiyati | tasmā rāsi saṅkanti c’eva dinakkhayo ca adhimāso pahotī ti | majjhe ti

cittamāsaāssujjamāsavithimesatulaṃ rāsī āyāmavitthārato aṭṭhasatasahassāni ekādasasahassāni sattasatāni chappaññāsayojanāni ekagāvutañ ca | parimaṇḍalato catuvīsasatasahassā
ni pañcavīsasahassāni dvesatāni aṭṭhasaṭṭhiyoja○nāni ti gāvutañ ca | antoāsāḷhamāsavithikakkaṭarāsī ā○yāmavitthārato chasatasamāssāni sattanavutisaha
ssāni | diyaḍha(g)āvutañ ca | parimaṇḍa○lato vīsasatasahassāni tenavuttisahassāni sattasatāni aṭṭha○vīsayojanāni aḍhagāvutañ ca | sesaṃ vuttā
nusārena anurupato ñeyyan ti yaṃ pan’ettha vi○nayaṭikākārena sāriputtamahātherena sinerucakkavāḷānaṃ a○ntare yojanappamānaṃ paricchindantena | sine{r}rū
cakkavāḷānaṃ antaraṃ parimāṇato | pañcasatasahassāni sahassānuṇasaṭṭhī ca satāni sattañeyyāni pañcavīsuttarāni (c)ātivuttaṃ | taṃ cakkavāḷapabbataṃ cakkavāḷato bahikatvā vuttattā na yujjati |

na hi cakkavāḷapabbato cakkavāḷato bahi hoti | ekaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ āyāmato ca vitthārato ca dvādasasatasahassāni tīṇi sahassāni cattāri satāni paññāsañ ca yojanāni | sabbaṃ satasaha
ssāni chattiṃsaparimaṇḍalaṃ dasañ c’eva sahassāni aḍhu○ḍhāni satāni ca | duve satasahassāni cattāri nahutā na ca e○ttakaṃ bah⁅u⁆ala(gg)ena saṃkhyātāyaṃ basundharā ti | evaṃ pa
ricchinnāyāmavitthāraparimaṇḍalabahalappamāṇāya ○ cakkavāḷapathaviyā uparisine{r}rūādinaṃ cakkavāḷasiluccayassāpi pa○titthitatā | evaṃ saṇḍitena cetthā ti etena saṃkhā
tappamāṇāya cakkavāḷabasundharā ā(dh)ārabhāvadipake○na bhummavacanen’ eva pākaṭaṃ hotī ti kin tena aññesaṃ aññathā vilapane○na | so hi heṭṭhā dvveasītisahassāni o(g)ā
ḷho hutvā tassā pathaviyā upari yeva sine{r}ruādayo viya patitthito na pathavī viy⁅ā⁆a udakapariyantaṃ katvā thito | tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ cakkavāḷānaṃ antare eko lokantarikantanirayo aṭṭhasahassayoja

nappamāṇo ti ca tato cakkavāḷābhim(u)khaṃ gantvā cakkavāḷasamipe caritvā ti ca s(ī)ne{r}russa cakkavāḷasacayaṃ thānaṃ vemajjhantī ti ca ādīhi vacanehi tassa cakkavāḷabhāro pākado ye rāti | pari
kkhipitvāna taṃ sabbaṃ lokadhātum⁅e⁆ayaṇ (ṭh)ito ti vacanato ○ so gato bāhirā bhaveyyā ti ce | avayavāvayavīvasena ta○ssa tacāvacanato chaviyā kāyo paṭicchanno yathā
bhūtaṃ na dissatī ti ādisu viya | tattha hi ca viavaya○vo kāyo avayavī tesaṃ vasena chaviyā kāyo paṭicchanno ti vuttaṃ ○ | na chavikāyato bahi aññavasena evam i(dh)ā
pi lokadhāt(ū)avayavīcakkavāḷasiluccayo avaya○vo | tesaṃ vasena tathā vuttaṃ | yathā cakkavāḷan ti ○ lokadhātu | sā hi nemimaṇḍalasadise
na cakkavāḷapabbatena samantato parikkhittattā cakkavāḷan ti vuccatī ti | ekena cakkanemicakkato bahiaññā na hoti cakkāvayavo ca | evaṃ cakkavāḷapabbato cakkavāḷato bahi añño

na hoti cakkavāḷā vayavo (cā) ti dassetī ti daṭṭhabbaṃ | evaṃ pathamavuttaṃ yojanappamāṇe samudde va appatitthā pi te tato parivuttāni majjhavithiṃ tato nāmā ti ādīni suriyavithiyojana
ppamāṇāni khalitān’ eva bhaveyyuṃ | ○ sine{r}rū cakkavāḷānaṃ antaran ti etthā pi sine{r}rusaddena sine{r}rūga○haṇe pi yathāvuttadoso vasiyā |
yaṃ pi ca sihaḷadīpavemajjhe sine{r}rū antare ○ yojanappa(mā)ṇaṃ | tasmā sihaḷadīpassa majjhato ○ me{r}ruantaraṃ duve satasahassāni d(v)isate chādhikā
ni pate tiṃsañ ca sahassāni aṭṭhārasati gāvutan ti vu○ttaṃ | taṃ sine{r}ruto sattannaṃ pabbatānaṃ vemajjhassa sudassanapa○bbatassa vemajjham pi na pāpuṇāti | kathaṃ | si
ne{r}ruyugandharādīnaṃ antare sīdantarasamuddā (n)āma tevisālato yathākkamaṃ sine{r}ruādīnaṃ accuttamasamānaparimāṇā ti vadantī ti etena vuttappamāṇena sine{r}rupāde samuddho caturāsī ti

yojanasahassāni | yugandharo dvetāḷīsasahassāni tassa bahisamuddo tattako va | isindaro ekavīsasahassāni tathā tassa bahisamuddo | karaviko pañcasatādhikadasasaha
ssaṃ tathā tassa bahisamuddo | ettakāni pi dvesa○tasahassāni ekatiṃsasahassāni gatāni dvisahassaṃ dvisataṃ aṭṭhā○rasatigāvuttappamāṇam eva avasiṭṭhaṃ | taṃ sudassanapa
bbatassa pañcasahassadvisatapaññāsayojanapamā○ṇassa vemajjhathānato catusatachayojanaekatāvutena oṇapa○desam eva pā⁅..⁆puṇāti | ku(ṭ)o assakaṇṇapabba
takuṭo jambudīpakuṭo sihaḷadīpan ti idam eva ○ atimahākhalitaṃ | evarūpaṃ hi thānaṃ paññācakkhupateh’eva daṭṭha○bbaṃ | ye c’aññe pi ācariyā cakkavāḷapariyāpa
nnaṃ katvā vadanti | tesaṃ citādisam evā ti veditabbaṃ | iti vithīdipano nāma tatiyo kaṇḍo | candimasuriyā ekappahāren’ eva tīsu dīpesu paññāyanti evaṃ mahiddikā | ekekāya disā

ya navanavayojanasatasahassāni andhakāraṃ vidhamitvā ālokaṃ dassenti evaṃ mahānubhāvā | kathaṃ | imasmiṃ hi dīpe suriyuggamanakāle pubbavidehe ditamajjhattiko kālo hoti | uttaraku
rūsu atthaṅgamanakālo | tadā hi suriyamaṇḍalaṃ ○ uggacchantaṃ hutvā pi imasmiṃ dīpe thitassa upaḍham eva dissati | u○ttar⁅u⁆akurūs(u) thitassa ogacchanta hutvā upadaḍham eva dissati
| evaṃ ekavelāyam eva tīsu dīpesu ālokaka○raṇaṃ hoti | amaragoyāne majjhimayāmo pubbavi○deham hi ugga[ma]nakāle uttarakurusu majjhattiko
(g)oyāne atthaṅgamanakālo idha majjhimayā○me | uttarakurūsu uttamanakāle (g)oyān⁅..⁆e majjhattiko ○ idh’ atthaṅgamanakā⁅..⁆lo pubbavidehe majjhimayā
mo ti | (g)oyānadipe uggamanakāle idha majjhantiko videhadipe atthaṅgamanaṃ uttarakurūsu majjhimayāmo ti | (t)ath’ etaṃ vuccati | imamhi dīpe ravino diyeḍhe majjhantiko hoti videhadi

pe kurumhi dīpamhi atthaṅgame ti goyānadīpamhi upaḍharatti | surodayo hoti yadā videhe majjhantiko hoti tadā kurūsu goyānadīpamhi dirāvasānaṃ hoti ḍharattaṃ idha jambudīpe | kurusu dī
po vinodayamhi goyānadipe divamajjhakālo ○ idh’ eva dīpe bhavate divantaṃ pubbavidehe bhavataḍharattaṃ | goyāna○dīpe suriyodayamhi majjhantikā lobhavatīdha dī
pe atthaṅgamo pubbavidehadīpe dīputtare aḍha○nisaṃbhave ve ti | idañ ca vacanaṃ samarattindivesu | dvīsu cittamāsaā○ssuj(j)amāses(v) eva labbhamānaṃ tisu dīpesu udaya
majjhantikaatthaṅgamanakālānaṃ samataṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ ○ na hi aññamāsesu tesaṃ samatā labhati | etena ca uda○yathitamajjhantikatthaṅgamanakālānaṃ samatā dipane
na catūsu dipesu vithimāsautusamatā dipitā hotī ti daṭṭhabbaṃ | aññathā hi kadāci pi tesaṃ samatā nakavessa | vithimāsautuvisamatāya hi sati yadā idha dīpe cittamāso hoti |

tadā videhadīpe āsāḷhamāso uttarakurusu āssujjamāso goyāne pussamāso cittamāso ca samarattindiro tathā āssujjamāso āsāḷhamāse dighadivaso pussamāso rassadi
vaso | evaṃ visamamāsadivase sutīsu dīpesu kathaṃ ○ udayādīnaṃ samatā bhaveyya kadā(c)i pi na bhaveyyā ti | pāḷiyaṭṭha○kathādīsu ca pamāṇavacanabhūtesu catūsu dīpesu vi
thimāsautuvisamatā vacanaṃ na dissati | appamāṇa○vacanesu bāhirasatthesu evaṃ dissati | tasmā yutti upaparikkhitvā ya○thā pāḷiyaṭṭhakathā nirodhana hoti tathā gahetabbaṃ
| ekekāya disāya navanavasatasahassāni ○ andhakāraṃ vidhamitvā ālokaṃ karontī ti ettha pana yadā dakkhiṇadisa○to cakkavāḷasamipe bahimaṇḍale caranti | tadā
uttaradisāya assakaṇṇato satasahassaṃ pañcacattāḷīsasahassāni satayojanāni sattasaṭṭhī ca aḍhagāvutā vīsatiusabhāni ca ālokaṃ dassenti | tato paraṃ ca yāva cakkavāḷapa

bbato dveasītisahassāni pañcasatāni chabbisatiyojanāni aḍhayojanavīsati usabhāni ca avasiṭṭhāni | tattha ālokaṃ na karonti | evaṃ sesadisāsu pi | yadā majjhimavithiyaṃ cara
nti | tadā uttaraassakaṇṇato dvesa⁅va⁆tasahassā○ni navuttiyojanāni diyaḍhagāvutañ ca ettake (th)āne ālokaṃ (ph)aranti ○ | tato paraṃ yāva cakkavāḷā pañcavīsasahassāni
chasatāni aḍhuḍhāni ca yojanāni avasiṭṭhāni | ta○ttha ālokaṃ na obhāsenti | sesadisāsu pi evam eva daṭṭhabbaṃ | ya○dā antomaṇḍale sine{r}ru(sa)mipe caranti | tadā sa
bbadisāsu navasatasahassayojanāni na ppahontī ○ ti | ālokadipano nāma patuttho kaṇḍo | ñeyyapucce○na devānaṃ anumānena daṭṭhabbā | channaṃ bhumyantaraṃ
samaṃ dvinnaṃ pathamabhūmīnaṃ samā | na gāhi(t)uṅ gato | tasmā sinerupaḍhena pamāṇena va u(mb)ato anumānena daṭṭhabbā pāṭiyetā chabhūmiyo | tāsu paccekam ekā pi merupa

ḍhasamuggatā yojanāni dvitāḷīsasahassāni bhavanti hi | duve satasahassāni yojanāni punāparaṃ dvepaññāsasahassāni ubbedhena chabhūmiyo | kāmabhūmavaṇṇanā | dassetvā na
yato evaṃ channabhūminam uccataṃ brahmabhūminam uccataṃ ○ puna dāni kathayati | heṭṭhimā brahmalokamhā cā ti (t)āmaha(t)isi○lā ahorattena ekena sogatā aṭṭhatāḷīsa
yojanāni sahassāni catumāsena bhūmitā evaṃ vu○ttappamāṇena | sāya heṭṭhimabhūmikā ito satasahassāni sa○ttapaññāsahaparaṃ saṭṭhīñ c’eva sahassāni ub(b)edhe
na pakāsitā | ito ce padasāgacche ekāhe○n’ ekayojanaṃ soḷas’eva sahassāni vassāni samupātame ○ yojanesu pi vuttesu hitvā kāmappamāṇataṃ
sesāni vasavattīnaṃ pārisa(jj)ānam antaraṃ tañ ca paññahi paññāsa satasahassāni (c)āparaṃ aṭṭhañ c’eva sahassāni yojanāni pavuccate | pathamabhūmivaṇṇa{ṃ}nā | ito parāsu sabbāsu brahmabhū

mīsu yojanā tappamāṇā va daṭṭhabbā na yatāhen’ adhimatā | pārisajjappabhūtīsu ābhagavattā chakoṭiyo saṭṭhīsatasahassāni sahassāni cha⁅tacha⁆vutti bhūmito ābhattamhā sattakoṭida
saṭṭha ca lakkhāni pañcanahutā chasahassāni sabbadhi ○ | ekayojanam ekāhaṃ bhavattaṃ kittakaṃ vajje vassasatasahassañ ca ○ sahassāni tathā navanavuttiñ c’eva chasata vassāni sa
mupātam eti | rathareṇūchatti(ṃ)sato sikkhātā satta ○ okkātā chaññamāso pi satta te sattaṅgulaṃ ca muṭṭhi ca vidatthitā duve ○ siyuṃ | ratanādisatte vayaṭṭhitā vīsatusabhaṃ gāvu
taṃ usabhāsītiyoyanā ca tu gāvutaṃ | iminā yo○janen’ eva pathavipabbatādīnaṃ antaraṃ sabbabhūmīnaṃ veditabbaṃ va viññu○nā | dhanupañcasataṃ kosaṃ kosacattārigāvu
taṃ gāvuttāni pa cattāriyojanan ti pavuccatī ti | idañ ca yojanaṃ aññaṃ candasuriyapamāṇakaṃ vimā(n)ādiparicchedaṃ yojanaṃ aparaṃ pi ca | dasakkhārā ekapādā | chapādā ca vinā

dikā vinā pañcadasapādaṃ catuppādañ ca nādikā | saṭṭhī nāsi ahorattaṃ tiṃsarattikaṃ māsakaṃ dvādasamāsiye vassaṃ evaṃ kālaṃ vinādiyaṃ | lokapadikasārake idaṃ vacanaṃ vuttaṃ hotī ti |
